name: 7 Years of Rain
description:
"Now ?"

 "Soon."

 "Do the scientists really know? Will it happen today, will it?"

 The children pressed to each other like so many roses, so many weeds, intermixed, peering out for a look at the hidden sun.

7 Years of Rain is a short walking sim about a young girl who has moved to a new town. Playtime ~5 minutes. 

Based on the short story "All Summer In A Day" by Ray Bradbury.

GAME CONTROLS
  • A, D - Walk Left, Right
